name: Born To Be Wild
description:
Action top down shooter where you play as John James got a call from his chief to come back to base because there is a wild aggressive outbreak where If you die the infection will crawl into you and deform you and will take you over *walkers are not humans anymore* . you got the call to help out and evacuate people in the city nearby but then something happen the helicopter plummets out of the sky JUST in front of the military base your pilots and crew all died in impact but you YOU are John you are different then anyone else your stronger, better, smarter YOU survive the accident and grabbed yourself a gun and go on a rampage to kill the WAVES of walkers, the army has put outside of the base an air drop where you can buy your needs but it comes at a price of course . lets see if you can kill them all or if you will be a walker just like the rest.

Medkit/armor/bullets: 100 points.

charge: 1000 points.

Credits:
Design / Artwork : Bartel Meeuwsen
Developers: Niek van den Berg, Jesse de Koe
Sounds of the Walkers: Class of MV22 Landstede
